DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a #yFire card, become #yHeated by the amount of the cost of the card played.
Upon playing an #yIce card, become #yChilled by the amount of the cost of the card played.
You can no longer play any #yFire / #yIce cards or become #yHeated / #yChilled.
Gain #yStrength equal to how much #yHeated your are. Your unblocked attacks also apply the same amount of #yAblaze.
Gain #yDexterity equal to how much #yChilled your are. Whenever you fully #yBlock an attack, apply the same amount of #yFrozen.
Clicking on this card in the #yDiscard #yPile will put it in your hand. This card then becomes #yEthereal and #yExhaust
Clicking on this card in the #yDraw #yPile will put it in your hand. This card then becomes #yEthereal and #yExhaust
Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.
This card is automatically played when it is put into your hand. NL If you cannot play it, the card is #yExhausted instead.
Metamorphose a card to become thesorcerer:Fire.
Metamorphose a card to become thesorcerer:Ice.
Whenever the enemy attacks, they take damage equal to the number of Ablaze stacks they have.
Whenever the enemy gets attacked, they take damage equal to the number of Frozen stacks they have.
